metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24513 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Domain-bypass transient execution vulnerability in some Intel Atom(R)Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24513` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20210608.0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20210608.0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
